name: @localpro/sdk
description: Official SDK for LocalPro Super App API - Escrow, Providers, Marketplace, Jobs, Auth, Finance, Maps, Supplies, Rentals, Search, Referrals, Communication, Settings, Notifications, and more

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: LocalPro
